Package core.usecase_diagram

Class UseCaseDiagramPanel

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
core.usecase_diagram.UseCaseDiagramPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, UndoableDiagramPanel
public class UseCaseDiagramPanel extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane implements UndoableDiagramPanel
A panel for displaying and interacting with Use Case diagrams. Supports adding Actors, Use Cases, and Relationships. Provides undo/redo functionality via Command pattern.

  • Constructor Details

    • UseCaseDiagramPanel

      public UseCaseDiagramPanel(String name)
      Constructor for the UseCaseDiagramPanel. Initializes the diagram panel with a given name and attempts to load an actor image for representation.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Use Case Diagram.

  • Method Details

    • addActor

      public UseCaseDiagramPanel.ActorComponent addActor(double x, double y)
      Adds an actor to the diagram at the specified coordinates. Uses either a loaded image or a fallback circle shape for the actor representation.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate where the actor should be added.
      y - The y-coordinate where the actor should be added.
      Returns:
      The created ActorComponent.

    • removeActor

      public void removeActor(UseCaseDiagramPanel.ActorComponent actorComponent)
      Removes an actor component from the diagram. Deletes the actor and any associated relationships from the panel.
      Parameters:
      actorComponent - The ActorComponent to remove.

    • addUseCase

      public UseCaseDiagramPanel.UseCaseComponent addUseCase(double x, double y, String text)
      Adds a use case to the diagram at the specified coordinates with the given text label. Creates an ellipse to represent the use case.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate where the use case should be added.
      y - The y-coordinate where the use case should be added.
      text - The label of the use case.
      Returns:
      The created UseCaseComponent.

    • removeUseCase

      public void removeUseCase(UseCaseDiagramPanel.UseCaseComponent useCaseComponent)
      Removes a use case component from the diagram. Deletes the use case and any associated relationships from the panel.
      Parameters:
      useCaseComponent - The UseCaseComponent to remove.

    • setEditTextMode

      public void setEditTextMode(boolean mode)
      HELPER METHODS

    • isEditTextMode

      public boolean isEditTextMode()

    • setDeleteMode

      public void setDeleteMode(boolean mode)

    • setAddActorMode

      public void setAddActorMode(boolean mode)
      Enables or disables the mode for adding actors to the diagram. Sets the appropriate mouse cursor and handlers for interaction.
      Parameters:
      mode - True to enable adding actors; False to disable.

    • setAddUseCaseMode

      public void setAddUseCaseMode(boolean mode)
      Enables or disables the mode for adding use cases to the diagram. Sets the appropriate mouse cursor and handlers for interaction.
      Parameters:
      mode - True to enable adding use cases; False to disable.

    • setDragMode

      public void setDragMode(boolean mode)
      Enables or disables the mode for dragging components in the diagram. Sets the appropriate mouse cursor and handlers for interaction.
      Parameters:
      mode - True to enable drag mode; False to disable.

    • initiateRelationshipCreation

      public void initiateRelationshipCreation()

    • setRelationshipCreationMode

      public void setRelationshipCreationMode(boolean mode)
      Enables or disables the mode for creating relationships between components in the diagram. Configures the appropriate mouse cursor and event handlers.
      Parameters:
      mode - True to enable relationship creation mode; False to disable.

    • resetAllModes

      public void resetAllModes()
      Resets all interaction modes to the default mode. Clears any specific mouse event handlers and restores the default cursor.

    • getName

      public String getName()

    • addRectangle

      public void addRectangle(double x, double y)
      HELPER METHODS ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    • addRelationship

      public UseCaseRelationship addRelationship(UseCaseDiagramPanel.DiagramComponent from, UseCaseDiagramPanel.DiagramComponent to, String relationshipText, boolean isExtend, boolean isInclude)
      Adds a relationship line between two components. If relationshipText is "invalid input: '<'>" or "invalid input: '<'>", a dotted line with an arrow is drawn.
      Parameters:
      from - The starting component of the relationship.
      to - The ending component of the relationship.
      relationshipText - The label for the relationship.
      isExtend - True if the relationship is of type invalid input: '<'>.
      isInclude - True if the relationship is of type invalid input: '<'>.
      Returns:
      The created UseCaseRelationship.

    • removeRelationship

      public void removeRelationship(UseCaseRelationship relationship)
      Removes a relationship from the diagram. Deletes the relationship line and associated label from the panel.
      Parameters:
      relationship - The UseCaseRelationship to remove.

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Executes the most recent command in the undo stack, reverting its effects. The command is moved to the redo stack for potential re-execution.
      Specified by:
      undo in interface UndoableDiagramPanel

    • redo

      public void redo()
      Re-executes the most recent command in the redo stack. The command is moved back to the undo stack after execution.
      Specified by:
      redo in interface UndoableDiagramPanel
